descriptionHtml:
you must first download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10165]this[/url] mod to work.

I write their Properties now:

archery:10
one-hand:10
two-hand:10
light-armor:5
heavy-armor:5

Persian use fire and they have half resistance to fire. they are very brave and powerful, good archer and lord of sword. they are come from kingdom of Iran. their god is ahura mazda. their king\'s name is Great Cyrus.

if you like it, endorse me.

My other race mod is : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=18093]Real elf race v1[/url] .

My other race mod is : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=18261]Real elf race v2[/url] .

note : Maybe in summer (10 days after) i\'m going to create persian clothes and armors.
author: Moein Aria
